main event: An observation of a large bright light moving in the northeast sky at Pepperrell AFB.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 30 seconds., The object appeared to be a single bright light., The conclusion speculated that the object might have been a rocket, flare, or meteor., GCA personnel reported similar observations at another location., The report was part of Project Blue Book documentation.
witness description: No specific witnesses mentioned in the report.
